docs.snippet: THE world fight on narcotics took a step forward last week when the Council of the League of Nations set Dec. 1 as the  provisional date for the convocation of a conference in London to discuss the proposal to limit the manufacture of narcotics by...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE world fight on narcotics took a step forward last week when the Council of the League of Nations set Dec. 1 as the provisional date for the convocation of a conference in London to discuss the proposal to limit the manufacture of narcotics by the nations of the world.

docs.snippet: PERNAMBUCO, May 26.--A treacherous gust of wind broke the struts holding the after--motor gondola while the Graf Zeppelin was swinging at her mast late this afternoon.

docs.abstract: Lr from Nunez and Burguete, sent by Arab tribesmen to Cape Juby, repts that fliers were forced down at Cape Bojador; tribesmen believed to be holding them for ransom; missionaries leave Cape Juby to bargain for their release
